1.content: The mystery gang has arrived at an old and decrepit mansion, supposedly haunted by the spirit of a witch. The rumors goes that any and all who enter never leave the same as they once were. The gang are determined to go in and solve the mystery of the mansion. With Scooby and Shaggy having already had their Scooby snacks, the gang is ready to go in and solve the mystery. As they head into the mansion to split up and look for clues, a pair of yellow eyes watches from the shadows before dissolving into the darkness.
1.title: It begins

choices: Lewd Route (Mostly filled with innuendos or straight up erotica/smut)
Romantic route (Daphne starts seeing Shaggy in a different light)
Real Magic ( Mystery failed to be solved as real magic is involved)
11.content:
"Ugh, do we really need to go for another haunted mansion? We know I'd get to be the first to be targeted again right?" were the first words uttered by Daphne before anyone got the chance to start say anything.

"Well we can't leave things be Daphne, who knows what will happen if we leave the mystery be? And don't worry I'll protect you, always." was the immediate reply given from Fred, as he tried to sneak in some flirting with Daphne.

"Who knows maybe this time you won't be the 'danger-prone Daphne' we know?" spite Velma, as jealousy reared its ugly head.

Daphne disregarding both of them, actually came up a brilliant idea in her mind. Remembering how the mysteries were solved and who the key player, or players involved knew Fred's word might be a tad bit unreliable. Turning away from both Fred and Velma, Daphne faced both Shaggy and Scooby who were both pumped up from their earlier Scooby Snack.

"Well, if we must then I want to choose who I'm teaming up with. And I'd like to be teamed up with both Shaggy and Scooby, and that's final. If that's alright with you guys?" as Daphne nods towards both Shaggy and Scooby.

In response to Daphne, the rest of the gang reflexively shouted in surprise, "Huh?!"

Fred being the first to come out of his shock starts to coax Daphne, "But Daphne, we usually go together?!"

"As I said, FINAL!" the only response given by Daphne

Meanwhile Velma was silent as she blushes at the opportunity given to be alone together with Fred, while both Shaggy and Scooby just remained confused and now slightly hungry and therefore could only nod in agreement to Daphne.

"See, the others are fine with it!" Daphne triumphantly exclaimed.

Defeated Fred could only agree, "Alright then, that would be how we'll split up. If that's all, Iet's split-up gang."
11.title: Daphne as the story focus

115.content:
With that settled and decided on the gang splits up into their two groups to investigate the mansion. As they do so the witch's ghost watches this and smiles to her self.
         "So another group of people have come to dispel the rumors of my existence." She said to her self. "But they seem to have brought a couple of fine, young women with them too. Perhaps I'll finally be able to gain a new, youthful body and finally be able to escape this place."
115.title: Real Magic ( Mystery failed to be solved as rea...

info.brief_description: Scooby doo and the gang have heard of a mansion haunted by the ghost of a witch.
info.description:
Scooby doo and the gang will be heading into a mansion haunted by a witch whose magic and concoctions transforms their targets. This can be as simple as a lighter complexion of the skin or altered hair length. It can also be more complex such as tging them or changing their species. Just about anything goes, with a few rules.
         NO DEATH
         Any change that happens is not permanent, The change can be removed or altered but must be done so by magic or an effect of the magic. Ex. If Daphne is hit with a breast expansion spell, her breast could continue to grow after they initially stop if the spell is designed is designed to due so, such as growth spurts every hour or as long as she fondles herself.
         Sex is allowed
         Stories may end, but I reserve the right to decide if it ends too short.
         I reserve the right to remove any chapter should I so wish.
Other then that, have fun.
info.pretty_title: Scooby doo and the haunted mansion
